column5: Hi Everyone  Planning a trip in the next few Weeks to Merrill lake , was wondering if anyone has been there and what the access is like , from what I can see map wise as I can take some logging roads to the lake , we are going to have ATV and some 12ft and 14ft boats. ?
Is this Â the same zman I played hockey with and went to Vermont with? Never been to that lake, but sounds like a good time
